pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Haskell binding for the OpenAL Utility Toolkit, which makes managing of OpenAL contexts, loading sounds in various formats and creating waveforms very easy. For more information about the C library on which this binding is based, please see: <http://connect.creativelabs.com/openal/Documentation/The%20OpenAL%20Utility%20Toolkit.pdf>.

use.flag: When compiling under Windows, use the native libraries.
